alert.note: Alert for Polk; Scott (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 4:19PM CDT until May 19 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Scott County in western Arkansas... Northwestern Polk County in western Arkansas... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 419 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Hatfield, or 8 miles west of Mena, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Mena... Hatfield... Polk County Fairgrounds... Mena Intermountain Airport... Acorn... Board Camp... Rocky... Nunley... Ink... Camp Pioneer... Potter... Dallas... Shady Grove... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
